release.action: Renamed EB-Eye domain from chembl-compound to chembl-molecule.

release.description: Now searching also EFO, OMIM and MeSH. JMX-manageable search fields.
release.action: Added EFO, OMIM and MeSH to the Domains enumeration - now in an independent file -, which now contains lists of default search fields.
Added search fields to EbeyeConfiguration, where they can be modified via JMX.

Added callable EbeyeCallable.GetUniprotReferencesCallable to retrieve UniProt accessions referenced by the results of a search in domains not supporting the UNIPROT pseudo-field (namely EFO, OMIM and MeSH).
Updated to latest version of parent pom file (move to GitHub), ep-domain, ep-util and junit.
Fixed method EbeyeAdapter.getUniprotRefAccesionsMap to return accessions (as per method name and javadocs) instead of IDs.
Updated to latest versions of parent, ep-domain, ep-util and log4j.
Using the shared uk.ac.ebi.biobabel:ebeye-client artifact instead of uk.ac.ebi.ep:ebeye-client (deprecated).
